data.actual_result: It displays above and below everywhere AROUND the middle
data.expected_result: It displays in the middle, like it does in the normal servers
data.short_description: Server names that are entirely symbols (ex. seperator servers) do not show correctly in mutual servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Create or join a server that does not have an icon and is named entirely symbols - Look in mutual servers with either a friend or yourself - Compare the spacing from that server to another server with text
